title: CIFAKE: Real and AI-Generated Synthetic Images
description: A dataset containing 120,000 images - 60,000 real images and 60,000 AI-generated fake images for training detection models.

title: DeepFake Detection Challenge Dataset
description: Microsoft's comprehensive dataset with real and AI-manipulated videos for deepfake detection research.

title: GPT-2 Output Dataset
description: Large-scale dataset of GPT-2 generated text for training AI text detection models.

title: FaceForensics++
description: Benchmark dataset for facial manipulation detection with various deepfake generation methods.

title: AI-Generated Text Detection Corpus
description: Multi-domain corpus for detecting AI-generated text across various topics and styles.

title: DALL-E 2 vs Real Images
description: Curated dataset comparing DALL-E 2 generated images with real photographs for detection training.
